extendedInfo.description: Manage all your notes with Note l!st.Note l!st is an elegant note manager. Note l!st differs from other note apps by it's simple operation and versatility. Use Note l!st to create quick notes, todo items and write down all your ideas and reminders. With the folder structure you keep all your notes organized.Most important features:- Manage all your notes.- Stores related information like title and priority.- Check completed items.- Sort notes and folders.- Share notes with friends.- Search notes.- Option to add a shortcut to your home screen to quickly add a new note.- Organize notes with customizable folders- Archive folders- Backup/Restore to SD.- Full language support for: English, Dutch, Spanish."Note l!st Helps to Manage All Your Notes - Editor Picked by AppEggs.com"

reviews.title: Gorgeous!
reviews.comment: The app is beautiful, first and foremost. I really like the color scheme and design you chose. I would be glad to donate, if you did one thing. If you add the ability to italicize and bold characters, I DEFINITELY would donate.
reviews.author: David Castro

reviews.title: My favorite so far
reviews.comment: Trying to find a simple note app since Catch shut down. I like the ease of this and that I can make folders. Wish it had widget & checklists
reviews.author: Kathryn Farhan

reviews.comment: Nice app thank you :)
reviews.author: Akarsh Sundareswar

reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.comment: The best way to organize notes. Thanks!
reviews.author: Linda Schade

reviews.title: Clean, Elegant & Simple
reviews.comment: For reseaching articles, this is my favorite. Please add a highliter tool or maybe an underline tool in order to be able to quicly go to areas of interest already read. Please add a dialogue box asking to save before loosing work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good note taking app
reviews.comment: Good app for taking notes and keeping up with tasks.  Very nice and minimalistic interface as well. However, it will be worthy of five stars once some type of cloud backup is implemented.
reviews.author: Anthony Hartounian

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Very clean and classy app. Love it! Suggestions: adding check boxes and allow users to do strikethroughs with their notes.
reviews.author: david la

reviews.title: Simple and clear
reviews.comment: A lot of notes apps are overloaded with functions that only few people really find useful (imo). The developer of this app goes the opposite way and tries to compromise between minimalistic design and functionality. IMO done very well. A little widget would be useful.
reviews.author: Robert Klinzmann

reviews.title: Clean and good looking
reviews.comment: Would be perfect if added pictures and voice
reviews.author: Alexander Reissig

reviews.title: Very clean and intuitive UI
reviews.comment: This app works perfectly for me. The design is clean and modern, and everything is exactly where I\'d expect it to be. I love using it.
reviews.author: Gareth Fry

reviews.title: Lovely Holo styled app
reviews.comment: Definitely looks very good on screen and is simple enough in use. If you could add check boxes and cloud storage, that would make it my ultimately favourite daily note app.
reviews.author: Jon-Cameron Bates

reviews.title: Very Nice Note App
reviews.comment: It needs to have a few more features to make a 5-star app: Password protected notes would be nice. Overall, I love the clean, streamlined look.
reviews.author: Tracey Smith

reviews.title: Allmost perfect !
reviews.comment: Very nice ui, lack of cloud (google task/drive, dropbox etc...) Sync.
reviews.author: Chneor Assouline

reviews.title: Nice design
reviews.comment: Very nice design and layout of the app. The possibility to add photos to notes would make it better
reviews.author: Alessandro Miragoli

reviews.title: Nice and clean
reviews.comment: I like the app a lot, but I\'d like to be able to select my backup location and set it to my externalSD card.  Cloud integration would be nice, too.
reviews.author: Rodney Ha

reviews.title: Clean
reviews.comment: Awesome and very clean.  Lacking in features stops it from becoming my main note app. Please add some sort of syncing /cloud support.  Also folders within folders can help really clean up my notes.
reviews.author: Michael Ian

reviews.title: Great UI, but....
reviews.comment: In this \"always connected\" age without cloud backup and single sign-on options, the app is almost useless.   Sorry, but with Google+ and Google drive integration would rate this app at least 4stars
reviews.author: Sathya Vasudeva

reviews.title: Love the UI
reviews.comment: Love using this app.. I wish there was backup to the cloud like to Google or Evernote or Dropbox or Box..
reviews.author: Jhosie Tsix

reviews.title: Beautiful and Simple
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t ask for a more better simple note-taking app. I\'m a huge Evernote user but sometimes I just need something for jotting down recipe ideas and note to myself, and this app is perfect for that. Also, I wish more Android devs put this much work into making their apps look as beautiful as this one.  Also, like a lot of other users here I\'d love to see some kind of simple cloud integration or sync solution implemented. Nothing fancy, but I\'d like to be able to sync my note between my phone and tablet, at least.
reviews.author: Xavier King

reviews.title: This is exactly what I want
reviews.comment: Easy and simple   could be great if u add online sync
reviews.author: Chainarin Punjarruangpong
